com.b2international.index.compat

Class SingleDirectoryIndexImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.index.compat.SingleDirectoryIndexImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SingleDirectoryIndex, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationRunIndex
    Deprecated. 
    - in favor of new index api, use that if possible

    public abstract class SingleDirectoryIndexImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SingleDirectoryIndex, java.io.Closeable
    An abstract implementation for an index service which does not use multiple directories.
